data.title: FCIB is now offering mobile phone banking
data.meta_description: Sybase 365, a subsidiary of Sybase, Inc. (NYSE: SY), the global leader in mobile messaging and mobile commerce services, earlier this week announced a partnership with FirstCaribbean International Bank to provide customers with mobile banking services enabling them the flexibility and convenience of managing their finances over their mobile phones.{{more}}FirstCaribbean International Bank is the largest regionally-listed bank in the English and Dutch-speaking Caribbean, with branches across 17 markets. The new...
